00046 using std::string;
00049 class GraspitDBGrasp : public db_planner::Grasp{
00051         GraspPlanningState *mPreGrasp, *mFinalGrasp;
00053         std::vector<double> mTestScores;
00055         Hand* mHand;
00056 
00057 public:
00058         GraspitDBGrasp(const GraspitDBGrasp& grasp2);
00059         GraspitDBGrasp(Hand* h) : mHand(h), mPreGrasp(NULL), mFinalGrasp(NULL) {}
00060         ~GraspitDBGrasp();
00062         const GraspPlanningState* getPreGraspPlanningState()const { return mPreGrasp; }
00064         GraspPlanningState* getFinalGraspPlanningState() { return mFinalGrasp; }
00066         void addTestScore(double s) { mTestScores.push_back( s < 0 ? 0 : s); }
00068         double getTestScore(int i) { return mTestScores[i]; }
00070         int getNumTestScores() { return (int)mTestScores.size(); }
00072         double getTestAverageScore();
00074         bool Transform(const float array[16]);
00076         void setPreGraspPlanningState(GraspPlanningState* p);
00078         void setFinalGraspPlanningState(GraspPlanningState* p);
00082         virtual bool SetGraspParameters(const vector<double>& pregrasp_joints, 
00083                                                                         const vector<double>& pregrasp_position, 
00084                                                                         const vector<double>& grasp_joints,
00085                                                                         const vector<double>& grasp_position);
00087         static QString getHandDBName(Hand* h);
00088 };
00089 
00094 class GraspitDBGraspAllocator : public db_planner::GraspAllocator
00095 {
00096 private:
00098         Hand *mHand;
00099 public:
00100         GraspitDBGraspAllocator(Hand *h) : mHand(h) {}
00101         db_planner::Grasp* Get() const {
00102                 return new GraspitDBGrasp(mHand);
00103         }
00104 };
